title: Dr Browns Options Baby Bottle - Reviews - What Moms Say Testimonial
description:
Introducing Dr. Brown’s Options baby bottle: The market’s first convertible bottle that can be used with or without the vent system. The new vent system is designed to grow with baby, and we recommend using this system to experience all the health benefits of our bottle. It helps reduce feeding problems, helps digestion and helps preserve vitamins. Some moms and dads find removing the vent a convenient option as their baby's feeding becomes more developed. The nipple venting creates a paced flow, and provides a feeding experience similar to most nipple-vented bottles. Options bottles fit most breast pumps, and are BPA-free and made in the USA. 

With the vent, benefits include:
• Helps reduce feeding problems – Our bottles are known for reducing colic, spit-up, burping and gas
• Proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients – Vitamins C, A, and E are critical for health in infancy
• Vacuum-free feeding helps digestion – Good digestion is essential for babies, particularly newborns
• Fully-vented bottle design – Closest to breastfeeding
• Internal Vent System and silicone nipple work together – Controlled flow so babies feed at their own pace

Some parents find removing the vent a convenient option when they:
• Have a baby whose feeding becomes more developed
• Want the convenience of a nipple-vented bottle


The Power Of Choice
This innovative bottle effectively and efficiently covers all parents’ needs. Dr. Brown’s Options grows with the needs of your baby and offers healthy benefits whether your little one is experiencing feeding challenges or not. Options gives you the power of choice.

Happy feeding.

transcripts: My name is Alison and this is baby Bella she is almost a year, we've been using the original Dr. Brown's bottle said she was born and then recently switched over to the Dr. Brown's options bottle. My name is Micah this is Elijah and his seven weeks old today, I have tried other bottles and he would not take them and then when I use the Dr. Brown's bottle he took them right away it was really easy no fuss and he was just really great with them. I'm Angie and this is six month old Charlie and we've been using the Dr. Brown's bottle since he was four weeks old, now that Charlie six months old I've noticed that he doesn't have as many of the stomach troubles as he did when he was first born. I'm excited to use the new options bottle it's great that I can use it with or without the vent and it makes it perfect for traveling over to grandma's or to the sitter's house. When I first heard about the options bottle I was very excited because now that Stella is getting closer to a year old she doesn't always need the internal vent system, she seems to do well without it. I can use it now while he's young with the vent inside of it and once he gets older and he starts growing and getting bigger I have the option to take it out. I'm confident with the Dr. Brown's bottle that Charlie is getting the nutrients that he needs to be healthy and happy.
